name: Warlocked: Last Spell
description:
***now with a warlock sprite in the updated version! (Bottom download)***

WASD - move (away from zombies)

K - attack (DICE ONLY)

space - jump (over zombies???)

You are a Warlock from D&D needing to fight the onslaught on undead from a Necromancer, like almost every D&D campaign. You cast the ultimate spell to liberate the world from turn-based combat, but you can still only attack with dice!

You cannot Melee the Zombies, this will cause you to take damage. 

Hit the undead with the d20 to do an attack roll. if the attack roll is successful, it will spawn 2d6 attack dice (4 if you roll a 20!)

The attack dice deal damage to the undead you got the successful attack roll against if you hit them with it. This is how you kill them!

Make it to the highest wave number you can! On the current version, I made it to Wave 4
